Name: Il Viaggio
Ingredients: 3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice).
Review: The ingredients might suggest that this cocktail should be stirred – I tried, but it benefits from the dilution and life that shaking imparts. After some elbow grease, you'll have a delicious bittersweet, herbal almond after-dinner drink.
History: Created in October 2016 by Wouter Bosch, Senior Bartender at The Duchess in Amsterdam, Netherlands. The name is Italian for The Travel.
